title: BRIEF-Ecolab Inc CEO Douglas M. Baker's 2017 Total Compensation Was $14.38 Mln V/s $14.35 Mln In 2016 ‍​
text: March 16, 2018 / 9:15 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Ecolab Inc CEO Douglas M. Baker's 2017 Total Compensation Was $14.38 Mln V/s $14.35 Mln In 2016 ‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Ecolab Inc: * ECOLAB INC CEO DOUGLAS M. BAKER'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $14.38 MILLION VERSUS $14.35 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING ‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2DyBPjY ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
